/* const part of ActorClass (ROM) */

} VelocitySensor_const;


/* constant for state machine data */
#define VELOCITYSENSOR_HISTORY_SIZE 2

/* variable part of ActorClass (RAM) */
struct VelocitySensor {
	const VelocitySensor_const* const constData;

	/* data send ports */

	/*--------------------- attributes ---------------------*/
	 float32 velocity;
